img_text: 13 hrs cally ysically ol e nigger The Nigger Marriage uard at We breed two nigger males with two nigger females Then we take the nigger males away from them and keep them moving and working. Say one nigger female bears a nigger female and the other bears a nigger male. Both nigger emales being without influence of the nigger male image at of frozen with an independent psychology, will raise their off of spring into reverse positions herself, independent and negotiable (we negotiate with her through her, by her, we negotiate her at will). The one with the nigger male offspring, she being frozen with a subcon- scious fear for his life, will raise him to be mentally de dent and weak, but physically strong, in other words, body over mind. Now in a few years when these two offspring's become fertile for early reproduction we will mate and breed Thie ond with the female offspring wil teach her to be likae nt le of them and continue the cycle. That is good, sound, and long range comprehensive planning. Tyne Toomer November 14 at 11:47 AM. If you've never read the Willie Lynch letter/Making
